thread.title: Abu Dhabi-listed Union National Bank Q3 net profit falls
thread.title_full: Abu Dhabi-listed Union National Bank Q3 net profit falls

title: Abu Dhabi-listed Union National Bank Q3 net profit falls
text:
Abu Dhabi-listed Union National Bank Q3 net profit falls 12.4 per cent fall in third-quarter net profit Published Sunday, October 25, 2015 
Union National Bank, 50-per cent owned by the Abu Dhabi government, posted a 12.4 per cent fall in third-quarter net profit on Sunday, missing analysts' forecasts. The fifth-largest lender on the Abu Dhabi exchange by assets reported a net profit attributable to equity holders of Dh480.59 million ($130.9m) in the three months to September 30, down from Dh548.68m a year earlier, a bourse filing showed. Four analysts polled by Reuters forecast an average net profit of Dh541.8m for the quarter. Reuters
